item.title: Struggling fashion chain forced into Chapter 7 bankruptcy, liquidation
item.description: The clothing and lifestyle brand is closing all of its stores and its website for good on Sept. 13.

item.title: Amazon is selling a 'reliable' $120 solar-powered outdoor security camera for only $30
item.description: "The two-way audio is handy for checking in on my pets, and the siren adds peace of mind."

item.title: Walmart is selling a $30 4-pack of turntable organizers for just $15, and they can 'hold quite a bit'
item.description: "I like that they are clear and have a small lip to keep the items from falling off."

item.title: Walmart is selling an anti-aging face serum for only $34, and shoppers say it's a 'must-have product for 40+ skin'
item.description: The lightweight formula hydrates, soothes inflammation, and reduces wrinkles and fine lines.

item.title: Tesla could be left out of the U.S. EV revolution
item.description: Tesla has long been the standard-bearer for U.S. EVs, but a shrinking market share and increased sales could leave it out in the cold.
